name: Limited Edition Holiday Prisme Libre Loose Powder Highlighter
ingredients: Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Dimethicone, Diisostearyl Malate, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Silica, Caprylyl Glycol, Pentylene Glycol, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Parfum (Fragrance), Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Tocopheryl Acetate, [+/- Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 77491 (Iron Oxides)].
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Place one or two fingers under the puff ribbon, press the puff onto the sieve, and shake twice for the perfect amount of powder. .-Stamp onto the cheekbones or apples of cheeks according to face shape. .-Blend in light upward, circular strokes.
